definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: After the collision, the bowling ball continues unaltered.
sentences.chinese: 在碰撞之後，保齡球繼續不受影響。

sentences.english: We walked hand and hand with Caitlin all the way to the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 我們帶着凱特琳一路保齡球場手和手。

sentences.english: This game has watermelon bowling, two bonus games potatoes mine warfare.
sentences.chinese: 本遊戲有西瓜保齡球，土豆地雷戰兩個獎勵遊戲。

sentences.english: Kathy and Susan are about to book a lane in their local bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 凱西和蘇珊正在當地的一家保齡球館準備預約球道。

sentences.english: “He was a janitor in a bowling alley, ” Haggis told me.
sentences.chinese: “他是一個保齡球館看門人，”哈吉斯告訴我。

sentences.english: In short, kind of like the worst of the worst when it comes to bowling alleys.
sentences.chinese: 總之，像最嚴重的當涉及到保齡球館最壞的一種。

sentences.english: Along with a bowling team, Mr. K formed a little book club.
sentences.chinese: 如同組建保齡球隊一樣，科先生成立了讀書會。

sentences.english: The Club also maintains a Lawn Bowls Pavalion in the Kolkata Maidan.
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部在加爾各答馬坦公園海有一個草地保齡球場。

sentences.english: The bowling alley is very smooth, and I fall down sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 保齡球道很滑，我有時候會滑倒。

sentences.english: He knew nothing about the setup of the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 他對設置一條保齡球道一無所知。

sentences.english: However, what it would be to play bowling in WEB?
sentences.chinese: 但是，你知道在韋博打保齡球是什麼感覺嗎？

sentences.english: Nixon built a one-lane bowling alley below the driveway leading to the North Portico.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松在通向北門廊的行車道下方修了一條保齡球道。

sentences.english: He was bowling badly after his long layoff.
sentences.chinese: 長期沒碰之後，他保齡球打得真差。

sentences.english: So, go straight down this road until you come to the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 沿着這條馬路一直走，一直走到保齡球場。

sentences.english: Even grandma is off the couch now and tossing a bowling ball down the lane.
sentences.chinese: 現在，甚至老艿艿都會走下牀去打保齡球。

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
